title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed my personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences in the field of technology.

title: Real-Time Underwater Imaging for Sea Animal and Trash Detection using YOLOv8
description: This project designed to detect,identify marine animals,plants and detect trash in aquatic surroundings. We utilized YOLOv8, a robust object detection technique, and harnessed the power of ONNX to facilitate model integration.

title: Store Management System
description: A CUI based Store management system with Mysql database connectivty provides authentication, having multiple roles(admin,manager) , saves customer details, having feature of note making and play quiz for fun.

title: The Daily Quest Extension
description: 'The Daily Quest' extension, a captivating browser extension that provides daily insights, interesting and joyful coding output questions, stimulating your curiosity and expanding your knowledge of programming.

title: G.A.R.I.B-General-Application-for-Rural-Income-Building
techUsed: Intel Dev Cloud | Android Studio(Java) | Firebase
description: Garib caters to different marginalised communities and individuals, helping them overcome their state of absolute poverty.

title: End to End Data Science Project Student Performance
description: A machine learning model designed to predict Maths scores based on various factors.This project structured in different pipeline and deployed on pythonanywhere web app.

title: PAMAP2 Activity Classification
description: This project presents a comprehensive comparative analysis of various machine learning models for activity recognition using the PAMAP2 dataset. The primary objective is to evaluate and compare the performance of different machine learning classifiers in accurately classifying human activities based on sensor data.

title: Formify:OCR Form Reader and Validator
techUsed: PHP | Optical Character Recognition (OCR) | API Integration
description: Formify leverages the power of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology to automate data extraction from paper-based forms and match details from the form using OCR and external API integration.

title: Real Time Sentiment Analysis using ML
techUsed: Machine Learning Classifier | Preprocessing | Python | Flask
description: Twitter Sentiment Analysis after preprocess tweets using SVC and RFC using Flask model intreprets and do Real time analysis.

title: BPE Tokenizer (Byte Pair Encoding)
description: A Streamlit-powered BPE Tokenizer trained on Wikipedia articles. Encode and decode text efficiently using Byte Pair Encoding (BPE).

title: AI-Powered Expense Tracker & Budget Advisor
description: The AI-Powered Expense Tracker is a web-based financial management system designed to help users monitor and optimize their daily and monthly expenses.

title: Stock AI Trader
description: An AI-based modular backtesting platform for retail investors, traders, and researchers. It allows users to simulate strategies over historical data with real-time performance tracking.

title: Real-Time Facial Feature Detection using YOLO-NAS
techUsed: YOLO-NAS | Roboflow | FastAPI | Tailwind CSS | JavaScript | Roboflow Anotator
description: A real-time facial feature detection system powered by YOLO-NAS and deployed via FastAPI. It detects facial components like eyes, nose, mouth, ears, eyebrows, and hair using webcam input and displays live results with bounding boxes.

title: Automated Image Captioning
techUsed: Python | TensorFlow | VGG-16 | Bahdanau Attention | Streamlit
description: An automated image captioning system using deep learning, combining VGG16 for feature extraction, Bahdanau Attention, and LSTM for caption generation. Users can upload an image and receive a contextually relevant caption through a Streamlit web interface.

title: CreativeNexusAI â€” AI-Powered Content Creation Studio
techUsed: FastAPI | FAISS | HuggingFace | Google Gemini | MongoDB | RAG Chatbot
description: CreativeNexusAI is an all-in-one AI-powered studio that empowers users to generate blogs, images, videos, and memes in seconds. It integrates multiple AI models from HuggingFace and Google Gemini, enabling creators and developers to automate content generation with modular FastAPI APIs and an intuitive frontend.
